name: SMA Europe e.V.
goal:
SMA Europe is an umbrella organisation which consists of 13 SMA patient and research organisations from 11 countries across Europe. It is staffed by one person.

SMA Europe's aims are:

1. to improve the quality of life of individuals with Spinal Muscular Atrophy (SMA),
2. to promote the interests of SMA patients in European health policy;
3. to raise awareness of SMA with the general public, healthcare practitioners, scientists and industry;
4. to identify, develop, promote and implement the best practice for SMA;
5. to promote and sustain scientific and medical research in all fields of SMA;
6. to increase collaboration between member countries.
interests: Public Health, Research and Technology, Trans-European Networks
euInitiatives: Working with the European Medicines Agency (EMA) to ensure treatments for spinal muscular atrophy.
